content:
User: The Reality Check
Scope and Timing: The MVP++ rebuild is already a massive lift—unified memory, dynamic registry, task execution, all rebuilt from scratch. Adding a full communication interface (especially voice) could stretch us thin and delay the launch.

Grok: Technical Hurdles: Real-time voice or a custom interface would need speech-to-text integration, NLP tweaks, and possibly UI work. It’s doable but not trivial—Claude would need to juggle it with the core rebuild.
